property.name: bind_ip
property.description: Interface on which to listen, by default all interfaces. Set for example, 127.0.0.1 to switch to the local loopback interface only. Or set to a specific internal IP if known.

property.name: tcp_port
property.description: Port on which mongod listens for incoming client connections. The Web Status page is always 1000 higher than this port number.

property.name: mongos_tcp_port
property.description: Port on which mongos listens for incoming client connections. The Web Status page is always 1000 higher than this port number.

property.name: db_path
property.description: Path where the mongodb is stored.

property.name: db_name
property.description: Name of the database to create post installation.

property.name: db_user
property.description: Create a user for the database.

property.name: db_pass
property.description: Password for a user. If left blank, post-install script will not create a user in MongoDB.
